CompareWithBranch.description: Remote branch name. Local SDKs will be generated and compared with this branch of codegen. Default: v3-staging

ComparisonPath.description: Local and Remote SDKs will be generated at this path. Default: /bin/*/*/

WinMergePath.description: System Path to WinMergeU.exe. If specified, application will compare, the local and remote SDKs directories after generation, using WinMerge. Default: null
